{{cpp/memory/scoped_allocator_adaptor/title|inner_allocator}}
{{cpp/memory/scoped_allocator_adaptor/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|scoped_allocator}}
{{dcl | num=1 | since=c++11 | 
inner_allocator_type&amp; inner_allocator() noexcept;
}}
{{dcl | num=2 | since=c++11 | 
const inner_allocator_type&amp; inner_allocator() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Obtains a reference to the inner allocator used to declare this {{tt|scoped_allocator_adaptor}}.

If {{c|1=sizeof...(InnerAllocs) == 0}}, that is, no inner allocators were declared, returns {{c|*this}}. Otherwise returns a reference to {{c|std::scoped_allocator_adaptor&lt;InnerAllocs...&gt;}}, that is, a scoped allocator composed of all inner allocators of {{c|*this}}, with the first inner allocator becoming the outer allocator.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A reference to the inner allocator, which is itself a {{tt|std::scoped_allocator_adaptor}}.
